feature.label: ECF Remote Services REST Support
feature.description:
This feature provides the REST support for ECF Remote Services. This API allows REST-based OSGi Remote Services to easily be created. For information about REST-based remote services see:
https://wiki.eclipse.org/ECF#OSGi_Remote_Services
